title: SoE works against democratic dialogue: UK HC
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The High Commissioner of United Kingdom to Sri Lanka, Sarah Hulton OBE emphasizes that the rights to peaceful protest and freedom of expression must be respected alongside all fundamental rights.
Therefore, in a tweet, she states that Emergency laws restricting those rights work against democratic dialogue and solutions.
Red alert issued for likely cyclonic storm over Bay of Bengal
Peaceful expression of dissent is not an emergency: UN Resident Coordinator
